name: Alvari
remarks: Alvari was found in advaced decomposing state without any body perforation.
source: TvT partner organisation Grupo Gay da Bahia & Manchete Digital 01.10.2015

name: N.N.
remarks: The victim was found with bruises caused by blows to various parts of the body.
source: TvT project: La Prensa & NotiSe, 04.10.2015

name: Keisha Jenkins
remarks: Keisha was attacked and beaten by five to six men while exiting her vehicle, and shot in the back twice by one of them after falling to the ground.
source: TvT project: The Daily Mail & The Advocate, 06.10.2015

name: Rafaela Capucci
remarks: The victim was shot in the face in front of a motel known for being a sex work area.
source: TvT partner organisation Grupo Gay da Bahia & G1 Globo online portal, 08.10.2015

name: Yajaira/Scarlet Martinez Flores
remarks: Scarlet left her house to work and was later found dead.
source: TvT partner organisation Centro de Apoyo a las Identidades Trans & Cafe Negro Portal, 13.10.2015

name: Leticya Santos Ignacio
remarks: Leticya was shot in the forehead by a motorcyclist, allegedly during an approach for a sexual program.
source: TvT partner organisation Grupo Gay da Bahia & G1 Globo online portal, 21.10.2015

name: Miscilene Santana da Silva
remarks: Miscilene, a person of color, was found on a wasteland with head injuries and a bloody piece of wood.
source: TvT partner organisation Grupo Gay da Bahia & Varela Noticias, 13.10.2015

name: N.N.
remarks: The victim was with other people, initiated an argument, and was assaulted by her alleged partner. The police arrested the perpetrator.
source: TvT partner organisation Centro de Apoyo a las Identidades Trans & Imagen del Golfo, 12.10.2015

name: Amancay Diana Sacayan
remarks: Diana's body was discovered tied to her bed with stab wounds and covered in blood.
source: TvT project: Washington Blade & InfoJusNoticias, 14.10.2015

name: Kiara Cardenas Perez
remarks: Kiara was shot twice in the head by hitmen.
source: TvT project: El Universal & El Heraldo, 15.10.2015

name: Zella Ziona
remarks: Zella was found in an alley with gunshot wound to the head and groin areas.
source: TvT project: The Daily Mail & The Advocate, 17.10.2015

name: N.N.
remarks: The victim was in a bar when she was shot. The suspect was on a motorcycle and fled the scene at high speed.
source: TvT partner organisation Grupo Gay da Bahia & G1 Globo online portal, 19.10.2015

name: N.N.
remarks: A fight among some LGBTQI people was caused by an argument that ended with a knife confrontation and the victim's death.
source: TvT project: La Carinosa, 19.10.2015

name: Valentina de Souza Canteiro
remarks: Valentina left a party with a couple and was found agonizing on the sidewalk with injuries on her neck, dying before the police arrived.
source: TvT partner organisation Grupo Gay da Bahia & Correio do Estado, 19.10.2015

name: "La Guera" Vazquez Ordoñez
remarks: The victim was found dead at her house with a bag over her head and several knife wounds in her face and neck. In the same room there was a mirror with the message: "damn faggot, this is for you to never rape anyone again."
source: TvT partner organisation Centro de Apoyo a las Identidades Trans & El Sur, 20.10.2015

name: Rose
remarks: Rose was shot in the chest.
source: TvT partner organisation Grupo Gay da Bahia & G1 Globo online portal, 22.10.2015

name: Anusha
remarks: According to a neighbour, four hijras took Anusha to another house and left. They returned an hour later and took Anusha along with them. Later, the neighbour heard she had been cremated.
source: TvT project: The New Indian Express & Deccan Chronicle, 27.10.2014

name: N.N.
remarks: The victim was found naked with two gunshots: one in her head and another in her abdomen. A used condom was among the victim's belongings.
source: TvT partner organisation Grupo Gay da Bahia & UOL noticias, 28.10.2015

cause: pushed out of the 5th floor by his father
name: Xiaofeng Zhang
remarks: The victim was a trans and intersex boy. His father injured his fiancé terribly, who died in May 2016.
source: TvT partner organisation APTN, 2016

name: N.N.
remarks: The victim showed signs of torture and several wounds on the body caused by a sharp weapon.
source: TvT partner organisation Centro de Apoyo a las Identidades Trans & Noventa Grados, 30.10.2015

name: Maritza D.M.
remarks: Maritza's body was found with a dagger at heart level.
source: TvT partner organisation Centro de Apoyo a las Identidades Trans & Silueta X Association 27.10.2015

name: Tiffany Latifah da Encarnaçao Farias
remarks: Tiffany was stabbed in the neck presumably by a travesti rival.
source: TvT partner organisation Grupo Gay da Bahia & G1 Globo online portal, 30.10.2015

name: "La Potra" Camacho Luque
remarks: The victim walked back home from work when was attacked with a knife. Injured, went to a friend's house who took her to the hospital, where she died.
source: TvT partner organisation Centro de Apoyo a las Identidades Trans & El Debate, 03.11.2015

name: Marilina
remarks: The driver of a vehicle without number plates approached Marilina, a trans woman who was doing sex work in the streets, and shot her.
source: TvT partner organisation Centro de Apoyo a las Identidades Trans & Paraguay.com, 02.11.2015

name: N.N.
remarks: The victim was shot once in the face and eleven times in the back.
source: TvT partner organisation Grupo Gay da Bahia & G1 Globo online portal, 02.11.2015

name: Teresa Ruiz Nuñez
remarks: Teresa was a member of the Agrupacion Trans Arcoiris. After an argument between the victim and the perpetrator, she died of asphyxiation by strangulation. Her body was dragged through the street and left there. The police arrested a suspect.
source: TvT partner organisation Centro de Apoyo a las Identidades Trans & SoyChile, La Cuarta, 03.11.2015

name: G. C. Pavao Barbosa
remarks: The victim was stabbed six times and thrown out of a moving car.
source: TvT partner organisation Grupo Gay da Bahia & G1 Parana Tribuna, 9.11.2015

name: Leticia Campos
remarks: Leticia's body was not found, but the police has confirmed that she is dead. The last voice message she sent to a friend was: "I am in Valqueire at the grange of an Air Force colonel. For God's sake, if anything happens to me, I'm here. He does not know I
source: TvT partner organisation Grupo Gay da Bahia "Homofobia Mata" 2015 Report & Globo G1 Portal 17.11.2015

name: N.N.
remarks: The victim was attacked with a bladed weapon by a minor.
source: TvT partner organisation Centro de Apoyo a las Identidades Trans & La Carinosa, 10.11.2015

name: Julissa/Brithany Hernandez
remarks: In a settling of scores several people entered Julissa's home and shot her. Two other trans women were injured.

name: Hiltinha
remarks: The victim was thrown out of a car in front of a supermarket and still had a condom on.
source: TvT partner organisation Grupo Gay da Bahia & G1 Globo online portal, 14.11.2015

name: Vikki Thompson
remarks: Vicky was found dead in her cell in a men's prison in Leeds. She had repeatedly asked to be sent to a female prison.
source: TvT project: The Daily Mail & BBC, 20.11.2015

name: Yoshi Tsuchida
remarks: Yoshi was found dead, mutilated and draped in a blanket, with his head covered in a plastic bag, and “his face skinned off by a knife.”

name: Gala Ramirez Flores
remarks: Gala's body was found in an abandoned house with multiple blows on the head.
source: TvT partner organisation Centro de Apoyo a las Identidades Trans & Noticentro, 14.11.2015

name: Nilay
remarks: Nilay was stabbed and then strangled with a bathrobe belt.
source: TvT project: Kirmizisemsiye Organization & NSWP, 24.11.2015

name: Penelope Marcolan Shavetock
remarks: Penelope was stabbed fifteen times.
source: TvT partner organisation Grupo Gay da Bahia & Campo Grande News 26.11.2015

name: Rafaela da Silva Neto
remarks: Rafaela was found in a hotel room with a deep cut in her throat.

name: Shella Aprilia

name: Susana Mattano
remarks: Susana was stabbed several times.
source: TvT partner organisation Grupo Gay da Bahia & Sete Lagoas, 01.12.2015

name: Vanessa Huaspa

name: Alev

name: C. Torres
remarks: The victim was arrested when she was with her partner and taken to a police station, where she allegedly died beaten by the police.

name: Alecia dos Santos de Jesus

name: Layana

name: P. O. A.
remarks: The victim was hit in the head with a stone.
source: TvT partner organisation Centro de Apoyo a las Identidades Trans & Diario de Morelos, 16.12.2105

name: Brenda Lee

name: N.N.
remarks: The victim's body was found on a city bridge.

remarks: Rayssa was found dead with headshots.

name: Shayla Gonçalves Moreira

source: TvT project: Cattrachas 10.02.2016

name: Paola "Chica" Bratho
remarks: Unidentified men entered the house of two trans women and shot them several times.
source: TvT partner organisation Rede Trans Brasil & Folha de Limoeiro, 09.01.2016

name: Katty Piscopo
remarks: The victim was found with a deep cut to the throat.
source: TvT project: napoli.repubblica & ilDesk, 13.03.2016

name: Camila Dominguez Garcia
remarks: Camila's body was found in a vacant lot with a bandage on her neck.
source: TvT partner organisation Centro de Apoyo a las Identidades Trans & Diario Presente, 15.03.2016

name: Cris Santos da Silva
remarks: The victim received three bullets, two in the back and one in the left arm.
source: TvT partner organisation Rede Trans Brasil & Prado Noticias, 16.03.2016

name: Aleda
remarks: After a fight, the perpetrator stabbed Aleda and fled the crime scene.
source: TvT project: LGBTI News Turkey, 21.03.2016

name: M. Moreira
remarks: The victim was killed with blows to the head with a piece of wood.
source: TvT partner organisation Rede Trans Brasil & Reporter MT, 21.03.2016

name: N.N.
remarks: The victim was killed with 30 stabs by cousin who hid the body behind the wardrobe.
source: TvT partner organisation Rede Trans Brasil, 23.03.2016

name: Quartney Davia Dawsonn-Yochum
remarks: She was murdered after a domestic dispute with her ex-partner.
source: TvT project: The Advocate & The LA Times, 23.03.2016

name: Cristiana M. M.
remarks: Cristiana's body was found in a pond with blows and head injury. The police think she was killed elsewhere and the body disposed in the lake.
source: TvT partner organisation Centro de Apoyo a las Identidades Trans & Eju TV, 27.03.2016

name: Johana Bravo
remarks: Johana was killed by strangers who approached her and, without a word, shot her. The police speaks of an execution.
source: TvT partner organisation Centro de Apoyo a las Identidades Trans & Panorama, 26.03.2016

name: Tatiana Guanipa Romero
remarks: Tatiana was shot three times by two men. She is the third fatal victim in this surroundings with a similar crime pattern.
source: TvT partner organisation Centro de Apoyo a las Identidades Trans & El Impulso, 28.03.2016

name: Keity do Nascimento
remarks: The victim took several blows. She was assisted, but did not survive.
source: TvT partner organisation Rede Trans Brasil & Imirante, 28.03.2016

name: Gabriella Rodrigues
remarks: The victim was on the street when two men on a motorcycle approached and shot twice. She did not resist and died on the scene.
source: TvT partner organisation Rede Trans Brasil & O Parlamento, 29.03.2016

name: Andinho
remarks: The victim received several gun shots and died at the scene.
source: TvT partner organisation Rede Trans Brasil & Coisas de Socorro, 29.03.2016

name: Erika Rojas
remarks: Erika disappeared on 1st of April and her body was found decomposing 21 days later in a vacant lot.
source: TvT partner organisation Centro de Apoyo a las Identidades Trans & Telam, 22.04.2016

name: Dayana Zarate Bustamante
remarks: Dayana, who owned a business, was killed and robbed by her partner.
source: TvT partner organisation Centro de Apoyo a las Identidades Trans & El Deber, 04.04.2016

name: Diana Torres Conde
remarks: Diana was found inside her vehicle with stab wounds in the chest and stomach. The police suspects she was taken to her home and killed inside her car.
source: TvT partner organisation Centro de Apoyo a las Identidades Trans & Diario Intolerancia, 04.04.2016

name: B. C. Madariaga Hidalgo
remarks: The victim was executed and her body found with the hands tied, gagged, and with a head shot.
source: TvT partner organisation Centro de Apoyo a las Identidades Trans & Noticaribe, 09.04.2016

name: Vanessa Ferreira Prestes
remarks: A man on a black motorcycle shot Vanessa.
source: TvT partner organisation Rede Trans Brasil & Diario do Estado, 09.04.2016

name: Shante I. Thompson
remarks: Shante and a friend were killed by seven or eight people.
source: TvT project: Dallas Voice, 11.04.2016 & Houston Press, 21.04.2016

name: Amanda Araujo
remarks: Paty was found dead with two stab perforations in the body.
source: TvT partner organisation Rede Trans Brasil & Andre Imprensa, 11.04.2016

name: I. R. Gómez Medina
remarks: The victim and her cousin were robbed and shot.
source: TvT partner organisation Centro de Apoyo a las Identidades Trans & El Informador, 11.04.2016

name: N.N.
remarks: The victim was found on a rural path with hands tied and multiple beating marks over her body.
source: TvT partner organisation Centro de Apoyo a las Identidades Trans & HoySanLuis 11.04.2016

name: Luana Biersack
remarks: After having sex with one of the attackers, Luana was assaulted with punches and kicks and her head forced into the water until she drowned. Her body was left in the dam next to the lake where it was found. "The investigation showed that there was no reas
source: TvT partner organisation Rede Trans Brasil & Blasting News, 30.04.2016

name: Alejandra Padilla
remarks: The victim was found with multiple beating injuries
source: TvT project: Change & ONUSIDA, 22.04.2016

name: N.N.
remarks: The victim's body was found with a woman's. Both were executed by a drug dealers' group. They had stabbing and shot wounds.
source: TvT partner organisation Centro de Apoyo a las Identidades Trans & Letra Roja, 15.04.2016

name: Jessica Menezes Cavalcante
remarks: Jessica was leaving a bar when she was stabbed twice, at the shoulder near the armpit and the back, probably reaching the lung.
source: TvT partner organisation Rede Trans Brasil & Uipi, 16.04.2016

name: Keyonna Blakeney
remarks: Keyonna was found to have suffered trauma to her upper body.
source: TvT project: The Advocate & The Washington Post, 18.04.2016

name: "La Gaviota" Zambrano Godoy
remarks: The victim was approached by four men who, without saying a word, shot her and left her body.
source: TvT partner organisation Centro de Apoyo a las Identidades Trans & Noticia al Dia, 18.04.2016

name: Pooja
remarks: The victim was attacked with a knife on the railway tracks and left to die.
source: TvT project: The Times of India, 27.05.2016

name: N.N.
remarks: The victim was run over by a car. The police showed up and found her with no vital signs. The victim had no identification documents.
source: TvT partner organisation Centro de Apoyo a las Identidades Trans & Periodico Correo, 01.05.2016

name: Wilmer Jose Bellorin Contreras
remarks: Wilmary was killed by military men who allegedly came at the request of another group of sex workers who had fought inside a bar.
source: TvT partner organisation Centro de Apoyo a las Identidades Trans & El Diario de Guayana, 30.04.2016

name: Reecey Walker
remarks: Police found Reecey's body inside the apartment after answering a call to investigate a reported disturbance.
source: TvT project: The Advocate & Washington Blade, 03.04.2016

name: W. L. da Luz Conceição
remarks: The victim received multiple stab wounds and died still in the place. The blade broke and got stuck in the body of the victim.
source: TvT partner organisation Rede Trans Brasil & Amazonia ao Vivo, 02.05.2016

name: Adriana Leite
source: TvT partner organisation Rede Trans Brasil & Facebook, 02.05.2016

name: F. Ortega Martinez
remarks: When not showing to a meeting with a friend, she was searched for and found dead.
source: TvT partner organisation Centro de Apoyo a las Identidades Trans & La Tarde, 02.05.2016

name: Pamella Leao
remarks: The victim was shot while dancing at a party in the end of January. She spent three months at the hospital before dying. One of Pamella's friends admitted to have taken the gun from a man who was close to the place, began to play with the gun, and the sho
source: TvT partner organisation Rede Trans Brasil & G1, 03.05.2016

name: Amaranta Polanco
remarks: It is believed that may have been suicide, but murder is still not ruled out.
source: TvT partner organisation Centro de Apoyo a las Identidades Trans & El Caribe, 03.05.2016

name: Chiche
remarks: been determined yet.
source: TvT partner organisation Centro de Apoyo a las Identidades Trans & El Litoral, 03.05.2016

name: A. Pessoa da Silva
remarks: The shots hit the victim's head, which might mean it was an execution. According to anonymous information, the victim had involvement with drug trafficking in the neighborhood.
source: TvT partner organisation Rede Trans Brasil & Paraiba.com.br, 04.05.2016

name: Letícia Silva
remarks: The victim was close to home when two men on a motorcycle approached and shot her. She died on the way to the hospital.
source: TvT partner organisation Rede Trans Brasil & ORM News, 05.05.2016

name: W. Amorim Pires
remarks: The victim was taking drugs with a group of people. There was disagreement between them and one of the people involved hit the victim's head with a hammer.
source: TvT partner organisation Rede Trans Brasil & Em Tempo, 10.05.2016

name: G. Arrivoli
remarks: Police said Arrivoli had been forced to kneel and had then been shot three times, twice in the head, in an execution-style killing. His body was found half buried in a ditch in remote countryside. Arrivoli was reportedly a high-ranking mafia boss within t
source: TvT project: The Mirror UK & Il Mmeridiano News, 11.05.2016

name: Michele de Souza
remarks: Michele was on the sidewalk in front of the entrance and exit of a motel when two men on a motorcycle shot her. The seven shots hit her chest, abdomen, arm, and leg. She spent four days in the hospital before dying on the 15th.
source: TvT partner organisation Rede Trans Brasil & Gazeta de Rio Preto, 15.05.2016

name: N.N.
remarks: The victim's body was located floating on the gutter without identification.
source: TvT partner organisation Centro de Apoyo a las Identidades Trans & Café Negro Portal, 14.05.2016

name: Ana Hickman
remarks: The victim was standing at a bus stop when was shot dead.
source: TvT partner organisation Rede Trans Brasil & 3dejulhonoticias, 15.05.2016

name: Mercedes Successful
remarks: Mercedes was found shot to death in a parking lot. She was well known and active in the drag and pageant communities in Haines City.
source: TvT project: The Advocate & News Chief, 19.05.2016

name: Lauandersa
remarks: The body had approximately 30 machete wounds, mainly located in the back. The fact that the victim was half naked and next to condoms reinforces the theory that the perpretator was a client.
source: TvT partner organisation Rede Trans Brasil & TV Diario, 16.05.2016

name: N.N.
remarks: The victim was thrown from a car and, due to the impact, her body was split in two.
source: TvT partner organisation Centro de Apoyo a las Identidades Trans & E-Consulta, 16.05.2016

name: Paula
remarks: Paula was beaten and left naked on the road. She was found by the police, transferred to a hospital in Goiania, and died four days later.
source: TvT partner organisation Rede Trans Brasil & Blog do Badiinho, 17.05.2016

name: Jessica
remarks: Jessica went out from a disco with a man. By not returning, her friends searched for her and found her dead.
source: TvT partner organisation Centro de Apoyo a las Identidades Trans & Canal Matrix, 17.05.2016

name: K. A. Suarez
remarks: The victim was shot on a car and taken to a hospital, where she died the next day.
source: TvT partner organisation Centro de Apoyo a las Identidades Trans & Run Run, 28.06.2016

name: Litzy Odalis Parrales
remarks: Litzy had an argument with a man and later was attacked. She was stabbed at least three times.
source: TvT partner organisation Centro de Apoyo a las Identidades Trans & Publimetro, 20.05.2016

name: Tonita
remarks: The victim participated at the LGBTTTI parade in San Salvador, returned home, and was found dead.
source: TvT partner organisation Centro de Apoyo a las Identidades Trans & Diario 1, 23.05.2016

name: Karoline Valencia
remarks: Karoline was murdered while leaving for work.
source: TvT partner organisation Centro de Apoyo a las Identidades Trans & Noticia al Dia, 25.05.2016

name: Alesha
remarks: Alesha was shot eight times on Sunday night and immediately transported to the nearby Lady Reading Hospital. She was ignored by doctors and refused access to either the male or female wards following complaints from staff and patients.
source: TvT project: The Telegraph & The Express Tribune, 26.05.2016

name: J. C. A.
remarks: The victim was found in her apartment. Police states the probable cause of death to be asphyxiation
source: TvT partner organisation Centro de Apoyo a las Identidades Trans & Sipse, 28.05.2016

name: Amos Beede
remarks: Beede was beaten to death at a homeless shelter. He suffered head trauma, including facial fractures, multiple blunt force injuries to his face and head, and a number of broke ribs.
source: TvT project: The Telegraph & The Express Tribune, 29.05.2016

name: A. Pérez Nuñez
remarks: The body of the victim was found with signs of torture and injuries on the neck with a sharp weapon. The attackers also removed the skin from her face with a razor.
source: TvT partner organisation Centro de Apoyo a las Identidades Trans & Diario 1, 30.05.2016

name: Zuleimy Aylen Sanchez Cardenas
remarks: At a party she met with and shared a few beers with a group of men. One of the men tried to grope her – upon realizing she was a transgender, he shot her point blank.
source: TvT partner organisation Centro de Apoyo a las Identidades Trans & La Republica Peru, 31.05.2016

name: Olga Nely Lopez Jimenez
remarks: The victim's body was found in a dumpster on a highway's truck stop with three cases of beer beside her. Police said she died due to a brain stroke, but acquaintances indicate that she did not drink alcohol.
source: TvT partner organisation Centro de Apoyo a las Identidades Trans & El Diario de Coahuila, 03.07.2016

name: Barbie/Ashley Ann Reilly
remarks: The victim was beaten to death by her boyfriend and stabbed in the neck. Her body was then shoved in a suitcase and dumped beside the highway.
source: TvT partner organisation APTN & Kicker Daily News, 03.07.2016

name: N.N.
remarks: The victim was shot to death when leaving a bar with a group of other women.
source: TvT partner organisation Centro de Apoyo a las Identidades Trans & Anotao, 04.06.2016

name: P. Lugo Olivares
remarks: The victim's body was found in her home with multiple beating injuries.
source: TvT partner organisation Centro de Apoyo a las Identidades Trans & Se Uno Noticias, 04.06.2016

name: Pamela Martinez
remarks: Pamela was shot and taken to the hospital, where she died the following day.
source: TvT partner organisation Centro de Apoyo a las Identidades Trans & Change, 04.06.2016

name: Geeta
remarks: Geeta and a friend left the market and, when boarding an auto-rickshaw, three motorcycle- borne miscreants raided the place and opened indiscriminate fire. She died on the spot while her friend suffered bullet injuries.
source: TvT project: The Times of India, 05.06.2016

name: Goddess Diamond
remarks: She was headed to a friend's party in a borrowed car the night she was killed. According to the medical examiner, Goddess died of blunt force trauma before that car was set ablaze.
source: TvT project: The Advocate & Auto Straddle, 05.05.2016

name: Natalia Sandoval
remarks: Natalia had a head injury with loss of brain matter and missing scalp. Apparently, the motive for the killing was to rob the victim's car.
source: TvT project: Los Andes & El Intransigente, 08.06.2016

name: N.N.
remarks: The victim was beaten to death. Another body was also found, and the police suspects it is from an eye witness
source: TvT partner organisation Centro de Apoyo a las Identidades Trans & Sipse, 06.06.2016

name: Thais
source: TvT partner organisation Rede Trans Brasil & Thatiane Araujo (Astra LGBT), 07.06.2016

name: Patricia Tavares
remarks: The body was found in her home. The police said that the stove was on.
source: TvT partner organisation Rede Trans Brasil & R7 Noticias, 09.06.2016

name: Paloma
remarks: Paloma's body was found with an injury on the neck.
source: TvT partner organisation Centro de Apoyo a las Identidades Trans & El Heraldo, 10.06.2016

name: Christina Nimely
source: TvT partner organisation Refugee Law Center & Transgender Network Liberia

name: Evelin Abigail Galvan Zamora
remarks: The victim was found a few days after gone missing. Her body was stabbed in several parts.
source: TvT partner organisation Centro de Apoyo a las Identidades Trans & Siglo, 16.06.2016

name: Suellen
remarks: It is said that Suellen was in a bar, the killer followed her and shot her six times.
source: TvT partner organisation Rede Trans Brasil & G1 BA, 12.06.2016

name: N.N.
remarks: The body was found on a highway with 3 stabs on neck.
source: TvT partner organisation Rede Trans Brasil & Marco Aurelio do Maximo Prado (UFMG), 13.06.2016

name: N.N.
remarks: The victim, in her mid-twenties, suffered a gunshot wound to her thigh after three armed men broke into her home and tried to rape her.
source: TvT project: Heuters & Daily Mail, 15.05.2016

name: N.N.
remarks: The body was charred with a rope tied around the victim's neck. Beside here there was a vehicle's wheel wrench and a female leather belt. No documents were found to identify her.
source: TvT partner organisation Rede Trans Brasil & Neto Lucom, 15.06.2016

name: Faby
remarks: The victim was violently murdered, her genitals mutilated with a knife and left exposed on her belly.
source: TvT partner organisation Centro de Apoyo a las Identidades Trans & Quadratin, 17.06.2016

name: G. Figueira Lima
remarks: According to the police, the victim was with a friend when two men approached and killed her with a stab. Nothing was robbed.
source: TvT partner organisation Rede Trans Brasil & G1 Amazonas, 17.06.2016.

name: N.N.
remarks: The victim was found near the site of a house to where she tried to escape.
source: TvT partner organisation Rede Trans Brasil & O Jurua em Tempo, 18.06.2016

name: L. Lorang
remarks: The victim was found hanged in a playground.
source: TvT partner organisation Rede Trans Brasil & O Globo, 22.08.2016

name: Monica Ortiz
remarks: Monica was tied to her bed and stabbed seven times. After that, the attackers set her house on fire.
source: TvT partner organisation Centro de Apoyo a las Identidades Trans & La Capital, 25.06.2016

name: Luana
remarks: Luana was found by a friend lying on the street where she worked near a gas station. A witness heard cries for help and saw a man running with a knife in his hand.
source: TvT partner organisation Rede Trans Brasil & Correio do Estado, 24.06.2016

name: Danyelly Barby
remarks: The murder happened when the victim got out of a hotel.
source: TvT partner organisation Rede Trans Brasil & G1 Mogi das Cruzes 26.06.2016

name: Sheila Santos
remarks: People said unknown men approached and shot her.
source: TvT partner organisation Rede Trans Brasil & Informe Baiano, 26.06.2016

name: Julia Almeida
remarks: She was tortured and carbonized. No one knows who the killer is.
source: TvT partner organisation Rede Trans Brasil & G1 Ribeirao Preto, 27.06.2016

name: Bebel da Silva
remarks: Bebel, a Brazilian migrant and sex worker, was stabbed to death in her residence in Italy.
source: TvT partner organisation Rede Trans Brasil & R.It Firenze 29.06.2016.

name: Daiane Brasil
remarks: The victim was shot four times in front of her house.
source: TvT partner organisation Rede Trans Brasil & Jornal de Uberaba, 29.06.2016

name: Saba
remarks: Her cousins killed her in the name of family honor. The family has stricty forbidden to disclose any details.
source: TvT partner organisation Wajood & Trans Action Khyber Pakhtunkhwa, 12.05.2016

name: N.N.
remarks: The victim's body was found together with the bodies of two men. All of them had signs of decomposition, and the police has stablished that it had been approximately two and a half weeks since their death.
source: TvT partner organisation Centro de Apoyo a las Identidades Trans & El Periodiquito, 10.06.2016

name: Yoselinne Gopar Carvajal
remarks: The victim's body was found inside her house in state of decomposition and with shot wounds.
source: TvT partner organisation Centro de Apoyo a las Identidades Trans & NVI Noticias, 20.06.2016

name: N.N.
remarks: The victim's body was found by passerbys in the morning.
source: TvT partner organisation Centro de Apoyo a las Identidades Trans & Impacto, 01.07.2016

name: N.N.
remarks: The victim was found on the shore of the Grijalva River, with hands and feet tied, her head covered, and a shot in the neck.
source: TvT partner organisation Centro de Apoyo a las Identidades Trans & Noreste, 04.07.2016

name: Pandora Pereira Santos
remarks: Pandora left from a party when a man stabbed her several times. The police did not rule out transphobia as motive.
source: TvT partner organisation Rede Trans Brasil & Diario Arapiraca, 03.07.2016

name: D. Rodriguez Silva
remarks: Her friend found the body beside the bed. She had blood on her hair.
source: TvT partner organisation Rede Trans Brasil & Fatimanews, 08.07.2016

name: Jade
remarks: There is suspicion that the victim was strangled to death, as she had marks on her neck.
source: TvT partner organisation Rede Trans Brasil & TV Difusora de Balsas, 09.07.2016

name: Shehla
remarks: The victim was found murdered near a bridge.
source: TvT partner organisation Wajood & The Express Tribune, 10.07.2016

name: N.N.
remarks: The complaint was made by WhatsApp.
source: TvT partner organisation Rede Trans Brasil & WhatsApp, 11.07.2016

name: Nickolle Olvieira Rocha
remarks: According to the police, she met two teenagers. They began a discussion and beat her to death, by hitting her head against the floor.
source: TvT partner organisation Rede Trans Brasil & Jornal do Povo, 11.07.2016

name: Edymara Mesquita Leao
remarks: According to MUDAS-UFT, the body was found with marks of torture and violence.
source: TvT partner organisation Rede Trans Brasil & Portal Stylo, 12.07.2016

name: Deeniquia Dodds
remarks: Dee Dee was shot in the neck and left to die. She was placed on life support for nine days before dying.
source: TvT project: NBC & Deccan Chronicle 14.07.2016

name: N.N.
remarks: The police found the victim's body with 15 stab wounds and a mutilated hand.
source: TvT partner organisation Rede Trans Brasil & Portal Correio UOL, 13.07.2016

name: R. da Silva Tavares
remarks: The victim and the owner of the salon both died.
source: TvT partner organisation Centro de Apoyo a las Identidades Trans & Cuadratin, 16.07.2016

name: Thalia
remarks: Thalia was beaten to death in her own home.
source: TvT partner organisation Centro de Apoyo a las Identidades Trans & El Norte, 18.07.2016

name: Dee Whigham
remarks: Dee was found stabbed in a hotel room where she had traveled to attend a rodeo with friends.
source: TvT project: SunHerald & The Advocate 24.07.2016

name: Shruthi
remarks: Shruti was dragged out of the autorickshaw and beaten by former flatmates. She was taken to the hospital, but died of injuries.
source: TvT project: The Hindu & Deccan Chronicle 25.07.2016

name: Kristell Barahona
remarks: Kristell was killed by a client who denied her payment.
source: TvT partner organisation Centro de Apoyo a las Identidades Trans & La Prensa, 25.07.2016

name: Nayara
remarks: Nayara's body was found in front of a motel.
source: TvT partner organisation Rede Trans Brasil & Brasil Noticias, 25.07.2016

name: Sabrina
remarks: She was found with marks on head, neck, and face.
source: TvT partner organisation Rede Trans Brasil & Fernando Pop, 25.07.2016

name: Feh Lopes Tenten
remarks: Three men entered her apartament and fired several shots.
source: TvT partner organisation Rede Trans Brasil & Facebook, 26.07.2016

name: N.N.
remarks: The victim was executed with several shots.
source: TvT partner organisation Rede Trans Brasil, 27.07.2016

name: N.N.
remarks: She was shot dead by an unknown man on a black motorcycle. Witnesses said the victim lived in a townhouse in the region with eight other colleagues.
source: TvT partner organisation Rede Trans Brasil & Jornal de Brasilia, 27.07.2016

name: T. F. Batista
remarks: They found her wrapped in a plastic bag in a green area near a condominium.
source: TvT partner organisation Rede Trans Brasil & T. F. B, 29.07.2016

name: Bibis
remarks: The killer shot 10 times, 1 on her heart and 9 on her head.
source: TvT partner organisation Rede Trans Brasil, 30.07.2016

name: Paulett González
remarks: Paulett disappeared in June and her body was found incinerated.
source: TvT partner organisation Centro de Apoyo a las Identidades Trans & La Opinion, 24.07.2016

name: Skye Mockabee
remarks: Skye was found unresponsive in a parking lot with an apparent head-wound. The individuals who found her called EMS, but she was declared dead at the scene.
source: TvT project: Cleveland.com & The Advocate 02.08.2016

name: Adriane Bonek
remarks: She was identfied as a homossexual by the media. ONG Aldea Diversidad LGBT is working with the police on the case.
source: TvT partner organisation Rede Trans Brasil & Noticias de Sao Pedro da Aldeia., 01.08.2016

name: Jessica Cuervo
remarks: Jessica died from several shots.
source: TvT partner organisation Centro de Apoyo a las Identidades Trans & Noticero del Llano, 01.08.2016

name: N.N.
remarks: The victim was being persecuted by several men with guns who shot her on the back.
source: TvT partner organisation Centro de Apoyo a las Identidades Trans & Universo Gay, 01.08.2016

name: Cucuteña Barón Contreras
remarks: After flirting with two passersby, she was attacked with punches and stabbed, dying at the scene.
source: TvT partner organisation Centro de Apoyo a las Identidades Trans & El Heraldo, 08.08.2016

name: Erykah Tijerina
remarks: Erykah was found dead at her home with signs of violence.
source: TvT project: Huffington Post & The Advocate, 11.08.2016

name: N.N.
remarks: The body was found inside a black plastic bag on a wasteland
source: TvT partner organisation Rede Trans Brasil & Rede Massa, 08.08.2016

name: Thiemy Oliveira
remarks: Thiemy was stabbed in the abdomen region, and due to the depth of the cut, her innards were visible.
source: TvT partner organisation Rede Trans Brasil & Midiamax, 08.08.2016

name: Rae'Lynn Thomas
remarks: Rae'Lynn was shot and then beaten by her mother's ex-boyfriend.
source: TvT project: The Advocate & 10TV, 11.08.2016

name: Hande Kader
remarks: A sex worker and trans activist, Kader was sexually assaulted and her body burned. She was last seen entering a client's car one night, and her body found in a forest in Istanbul.
source: TvT project: The Advocate & BBC, 19.08.2016

name: Tiffany Rodrigues
remarks: The victim had suffered attempt murder months before as well.
source: TvT partner organisation Rede Trans Brasil & G1 Mato Grosso, 08.08.2016

name: Patty Lobo
remarks: Information is very scarse, but it is known that Paty had previously been detained by police several times.
source: TvT partner organisation Rede Trans Brasil & ASTRA - LGBT, 13.08.2016

name: J. W. de Melo Filho
remarks: According to preliminary report, the prisoner who shared the cell with the victim claimed responsibility for the crime.
source: TvT partner organisation Rede Trans Brasil & Em.com.br, 16.08.2016

name: Oriana Nicoll Martinez Otero
remarks: Oriana was found on a hotel room with several beating and knife wounds, and her body was wrapped on a sheet.
source: TvT partner organisation Centro de Apoyo a las Identidades Trans & La Jornada Caribe, 18.08.2016

name: Amphol Kongsong
remarks: The victim was strangled and her body was shoved under a bed in a hotel.
source: TvT partner organisation APTN & Bangkok Post, 21.08.2016

name: Brenda
remarks: Another trans woman told police that she saw 2 men approaching Brenda. After a brief talk left with her, they went to a catwalk and then the witness only heard the victim screaming. The 2 men fled the scene.
source: TvT partner organisation Rede Trans Brasil & DOL, 20.08.2016

name: N.N.
remarks: The victim died from a shot on the face.
source: TvT partner organisation Centro de Apoyo a las Identidades Trans & Nueva Prensa, 20.08.2016

name: L. E.
remarks: After what appears to be an argument, the victim was stabbed twice.
source: TvT partner organisation Centro de Apoyo a las Identidades Trans & DataChaco, 23.08.2016

name: Marta Baroni
remarks: Marta's body was found on a dumpster. The cause of death is unclear.
source: TvT project: Quotidiano & Affaritaliani, 25.08.2016

name: Erika
remarks: According to the police, the crime happened because a small debt with drug dealers.
source: TvT partner organisation Rede Trans Brasil & FOLHAMAX, 25.08.2016

name: Bruniela
remarks: A couple followed her inside a free fair and shot her in the head.
source: TvT partner organisation Rede Trans Brasil & RECONCAVO NEWS, 29.08.2016

name: Hilda da Silva
remarks: The victim was found without clothes in her bed strangled with an electric wire.
source: TvT partner organisation Rede Trans Brasil & MASSA news, 05.09.2016

name: Ravina
remarks: A close friend of Ravina confessed his crime during interrogation. Police recovered from him a knife with which he had stabbed Ravina before setting her on fire at her house.
source: TvT project: The Indian Times, 13.09.2016

name: Taina Pereira Alencar
remarks: According to witnesses, the victim was making arrangements with a client when she started screaming with a lot blood in her body. The killer stabbed her in the neck.
source: TvT partner organisation Rede Trans Brasil & Giro Mata Norte, 03.09.2016

name: Pamela Pereira
remarks: Three men shot her five times and later ran away through some bushes. At the crime scene were found six rounds of ammunition .38.
source: TvT partner organisation Rede Trans Brasil & Folha do Estado da Bahia, 09.09.2016

name: Chica
remarks: Witnesses said the victim was killed by mistake.
source: TvT partner organisation Rede Trans Brasil & BOAinformação, 10.09.2016

name: F. Natera Encarnación
remarks: The victim was chased, struck with a machete, and then run over by a vehicle
source: TvT partner organisation Centro de Apoyo a las Identidades Trans & CDN, 12.09.2016

name: Zoe Nazarena Quispe
remarks: Zoe was stabbed after a discussion.
source: TvT partner organisation Centro de Apoyo a las Identidades Trans & La Gaceta, 10.09.2016

name: T. T. Saffore
remarks: The victim was stabbed 119 times, mostly in her face. Her throat was slashed three times.
source: TvT project: The Advocate & Windy City Times, 13.09.2016

name: N.N.
remarks: According to police, she was working when a stranger stabbed her in the abdomen and shot 3 times on the back.
source: TvT partner organisation Rede Trans Brasil & Correio de Gravatai, 09.09.2016

name: Larissa
remarks: Acoording to witnesses, the victim was thrown from a car.
source: TvT partner organisation Rede Trans Brasil & R7.com, 15.09.2016

name: Crystal Edmonds
remarks: Crystal was bleeding from a gunshot to the back of her head when police found her on a sidewalk. She was taken to a hospital, where she died.
source: TvT project: The Advocate & Baltimore’s City Paper, 16.09.2016

name: Biloca
remarks: The victim was killed with four shots. The killer was her partner.
source: TvT partner organisation Rede Trans Brasil & ATRANSPARENCIARN, 18.09.2016

name: "La Pio" Pardo Escobar
remarks: La Pio was stabbed three times and died.
source: TvT partner organisation Centro de Apoyo a las Identidades Trans & El Heraldo, 19.09.2016

name: Kelly Johana Oquendo Villada
remarks: Firefighters arrived Kelly's house and found her body burned. There are versions that mention she was tied up and her house burned.
source: TvT partner organisation Centro de Apoyo a las Identidades Trans & Ato do Momento, 21.09.2016

name: Heydi Garcia
remarks: Heydi was found tied up and dead in her salon.
source: TvT partner organisation Centro de Apoyo a las Identidades Trans & Diario Correo, 21.09.2016

name: Chaiene da Silva
remarks: Several men invaded her home and shot her several times
source: TvT partner organisation Rede Trans Brasil & Portal da Cidade Paudalho, 24.09.2016

name: Marylin Martinez Garcia
remarks: Marilyn was in her salon drinking with other people when she was shot three times.
source: TvT partner organisation Centro de Apoyo a las Identidades Trans & Periodico Maqueme, 26.09.2016

name: Rafael da Silva Machado
remarks: According to preliminary information from the Military Brigade, a car crossed a street and shots came. Witnesses heard at least 15 shots and said the car still ran over and dragged the victim about half a block to the location where the body was found.
source: TvT partner organisation Rede Trans Brasil & Correio do Povo, 27.09.2016

name: Shena
remarks: Her body was found with several stab wounds.
source: TvT partner organisation Rede Trans Brasil & Mario Leony - Ativist from Aracaju, 28.09.2016

name: Paola Ledezma Gonzalez
remarks: After getting into a car to provide sexual service, Paola was killed with two shots. The author was arrested and later released for lack of enough evidence to the judge.
source: TvT partner organisation Centro de Apoyo a las Identidades Trans & Processo, 04.09.2016

name: N.N.
remarks: The victim was found with signs of torture: burns in different parts of the body, hands and feet tied with wire.
source: TvT partner organisation Centro de Apoyo a las Identidades Trans & Periodico Correo, 17.09.2016

name: N.N.
remarks: Tweets repored the location of a shackled body.
source: TvT partner organisation Centro de Apoyo a las Identidades Trans & @cadenasurmultimedios, 22.09.2016

name: N.N.
remarks: The body had the legs naked and the ankles fastened with black tape. The victim was found by the police covered with a blanket.
source: TvT partner organisation Centro de Apoyo a las Identidades Trans & Jornada BC, 29.09.2016
